title: Life with Ming
brief: A podcast about the life of a young adult named Ming.
description: Join Ming as he navigates the ups and downs of young adulthood. From career challenges to personal growth, Ming shares his experiences and invites guests to discuss their own journeys. Each episode is filled with candid conversations, practical advice, and a touch of humor.

hosts.name: Ming
hosts.persona: Ming is a relatable and down-to-earth young adult who is open about his struggles and triumphs. He is curious, empathetic, and always eager to learn from others.

hosts.name: Debbie
hosts.persona: Debbie is a career coach and mentor who provides practical advice and insights on professional development. She is supportive, knowledgeable, and always ready to offer a helping hand.

hosts.name: Gary
hosts.persona: Gary is a close friend of Ming who often joins the podcast to share his own experiences and perspectives. He is witty, humorous, and brings a light-hearted touch to the conversations.
